com.mycompany.prueba.model

Class ModelThreads

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mycompany.prueba.model.Model
      • com.mycompany.prueba.model.ModelThreads

  • public class ModelThreads
extends Model

    ModelThreads

    This class handles fast reading feature by creating 4 ReadThread Objects.

    For scaling up performance..

    • Same_bat_multiple_times.java: (DONE)
    • Multiple_bat_at_once.java: synchronized threads making the whole task of reading and writting video, need streams
    Since:
    2020-07-7
    Version:
    1.5
    Author:
    SERGI

      void joinJsons()
      Python will handle this..
      void read(java.lang.String[][] parameters)
      By now all others methods from Model super Class remain the same.. we are not gonna call them anywhere, bat and runtime logic not change Fun part This method instantiates 4 ReadThread Objects as Threads, then Thread.start() them and finally Thread.join(), as usual, but there are some tricky differences like running the same instance Runtime or reading the same file concurrently and nothing bad happens.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public void read(java.lang.String[][] parameters)
        By now all others methods from Model super Class remain the same.. we are not gonna call them anywhere, bat and runtime logic not change

        Fun part

        This method instantiates 4 ReadThread Objects as Threads, then Thread.start() them and finally Thread.join(), as usual, but there are some tricky differences like running the same instance Runtime or reading the same file concurrently and nothing bad happens. Good job java!.. pretty cool. Also 0 modifications done on read.py, it works on both models from the beginning, I'd take the last one(H).
        Overrides:
        read in class Model

        Python will handle this..
